title: Bangkok to Bang Pa-in Expressway Drive
description: A smooth expressway drive from Bangkok's Bang Sue area to Bang Pa-in, Ayutthaya, showcasing the main northern corridor out of Bangkok. The route passes by Don Mueang International Airport and through developing suburban areas.

landmarks.name: Don Mueang International Airport
landmarks.description: Second major international airport of Bangkok

landmarks.name: Rangsit Area
landmarks.description: Major suburban educational and commercial district

landmarks.name: Bang Pa-in Industrial Estate
landmarks.description: One of Thailand's major industrial zones
